# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a Quarto book.

To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.

Steps to create this book using APA references published on GitHub.

* Create new GitHub repo.
* Clone repo on computer.
* Create new Quarto book.
* Copy Quarto book files to cloned repo.
* Copy apa.csl file to cloned repo.
* Add `output-dir: docs` to _quarto.yml under project: section.
* Add `csl: apa.csl` to _quarto.yml at bottom of .yml file.
* Push to GitHub.
* Turn on GitHub Pages and serve from /docs.
